education.name: Y. B. Patil Polytechnic
education.description: In just three years, I've gone from knowing nothing about computer science to adoring programming. Since then, programming has become a huge part of my life. To this day, even if it's only a few lines of code, I credit all of my teachers for encouraging me to pursue this hobby in the first place.

work.name: Yamini Innovations
work.description:
My job was to create a better website both feature and performance-wise as compared to their existing one. It was also my responsibility to maintain the site and keep it secured from any security issues
  • Used WordPress for boosting the development time.
  • Increased performance & functionality than older website
  • Made website SEO and User friendly.

work.name: Experteze, USA
work.description:
Our Web Portal allows our team to collect and manage a patient's health data from one central location, thereby predicting the severity and likelihood of disease based on our findings.
  • Designing Database.
  • Developing Backend.
  • Deploying the site.
  • Managed a small team

projects.title: Portfolio Template
projects.description: A fully customizable, mobile responsive React-based portfolio template that is ready for usage by any developer.

projects.title: Let's Catch Up
projects.description: Allow AI to help you keep up with what's going on in the world by reading some news feeds, talking about the weather for you on your command, or simply having a small talk with him.

projects.title: The Guardian Scraper
projects.description: A project that retrieves all news stories from The Guardian UK and displays them in a human-readable format, as well as providing custom easy to use API.

projects.title: Google Search Clone
projects.description: A Search Engine clone that searches the internet for websites, news, photos, and videos.

projects.title: React Weather App
projects.description: Weather API-based web app that displays the weather around you based on your current location and allows you to check the weather in any other area on the planet.

projects.title: Advice App
projects.description: A fully responsive web app that displays random suggestions on each visit.

projects.title: iiLegal
projects.description: iiLegal Music's personal website from YouTube

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock
projects.description: A more complex version of the classic game Rock Paper Scissors that allows you to decrease the likelihood of the game being drawn.

projects.title: Google Maps Clone
projects.description: Are you lost in a new place? See where you are now, and then find and go to your destination using routes suited for walking, cycling, or driving. With 3d View, you may choose between different map styles (Satellite, Streets & Navigation, or Outdoors).

projects.title: MediCare
projects.description: A Hospital Management System that manages doctors, nurses, or patients' medical data or prescriptions in a single location. There is no longer any need to manage separate files for each individual's record.

projects.title: Animato - An imaginary Food site.
projects.description: A responsive page created with vanilla CSS. Modern College's Web Designing Competition winner.

projects.title: The Perfect Cup
projects.description: A full-stack project with user authentication, a members-only blog, and the ability to receive feedback from user via email.

projects.title: Android Controlled Robotic Vehicle
projects.description: Through Bluetooth communications, interface buttons, and voice commands, the Android app enables users to control the robot from a long distance.
